channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- EventON Premium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- EventON Premium

item.title: CVE-2024-0238|2024-02-05T21:23:07.225Z -- Unknown -- EventON Premium
item.description: The EventON Premium WordPress plugin before 4.5.6, EventON WordPress plugin before 2.2.8 do not have authorisation in an AJAX action, and does not ensure that the post to be updated belong to the plugin, allowing unauthenticated users to update arbitrary post metadata.

item.title: CVE-2024-0237|2024-02-05T21:23:05.415Z -- Unknown -- EventON Premium
item.description: The EventON WordPress plugin through 4.5.8, EventON WordPress plugin before 2.2.7 do not have authorisation in some AJAX actions, allowing unauthenticated users to update virtual events settings, such as meeting URL, moderator, access details etc
